# GenScript

> AI-powered YouTube script generator that helps creators write viral scripts in their own voice.

GenScript is a web platform at https://genscript.io that uses AI to generate high-quality YouTube scripts. Creators can train the AI on their speaking style, analyze channels, research trending topics, and produce publish-ready scripts â€” all from one dashboard.

## Core Features

- **AI Script Generation**: Generate YouTube scripts using Claude (Sonnet 4.5, Opus 4.6) and other models. Choose Professional or Hollywood Studio quality tiers.
- **Voice Training**: Upload samples of your content so the AI learns your unique tone, vocabulary, and delivery style.
- **Channel Analysis**: Analyze any YouTube channel to understand content patterns, top-performing formats, and audience engagement.
- **Trending Research**: Track trending topics across YouTube, discover content opportunities, and create action plans.
- **Hook Generator**: Create attention-grabbing opening hooks optimized for viewer retention.
- **Title Generator**: Generate click-worthy titles with CTR optimization.
- **Idea Generator**: Get AI-powered video ideas based on your niche and audience.
- **Retention Optimizer**: Analyze and improve scripts for maximum viewer retention.
- **Thumbnail Ideas**: Get thumbnail concepts paired with your script content.
- **Transcript Extraction**: Extract and analyze transcripts from existing YouTube videos.
- **PVSS Framework**: Generate scripts using the Problem-Value-Solution-Story methodology.
- **Compliance Check**: Verify scripts meet YouTube's content policies before publishing.
- **Team Collaboration**: Work on scripts with team members in shared workspaces.
- **Credit System**: Pay-per-use credits with subscription plans for regular creators.

## Pricing

GenScript uses a credit-based system. Script costs depend on quality tier and video length:
- Professional Quality (Sonnet 4.5): 8-28 credits per script
- Hollywood Studio (Opus 4.6): 15-53 credits per script

Subscription plans include monthly credit allocations. Free trial available.

## Free Tools

These tools are available without an account at https://genscript.io/tools:
- Hook Generator
- Title Generator
- Idea Generator
- Thumbnail Ideas
- Hashtag Generator
- Transcript Extraction
- Retention Optimizer
- Script Length Calculator
- Voice Matching
- Faceless YouTube Generator
- PVSS Framework
- YouTube Script Generator
- AI Script Writer
- YouTube Shorts Script Generator

## For Creators

- Business Educators: https://genscript.io/for/business-educators
- Developers: https://genscript.io/for/developers

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js 15 and Supabase
- AI powered by Anthropic Claude (Sonnet 4.5, Opus 4.6) and OpenAI
- Analytics by PostHog
- Payments via Stripe
